mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, SELLER, SELLER_NAME, ORDER_ITEM, QUANTITY, ORDER_PRICE FROM "ORDER" WHERE ORDERER = #{userNo} ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
SELECT USER_NO, SELLER_NAME FROM SELLER WHERE SELLER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{sellerNameKeyword} || '%' AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SELLER_NAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION WHERE QUESTION_WRITER = #{buyerNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT QUESTION_NO, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE", QUESTION_SELLER, SELLER_NAME, CATEGORY, QUESTION_TITLE, ORDER_NO, ANSWER FROM QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN SELLER ON (QUESTION_SELLER = USER_NO) WHERE QUESTION_WRITER = #{buyerNo} AND Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT QUESTION_NO, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE", QUESTION_SELLER, SELLER_NAME, SELLER_PHONE, ANSWER, CATEGORY, ORDER_NO, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM QUESTION LEFT JOIN SELLER ON (QUESTION_SELLER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (QUESTION_NO = REF_QNO) WHERE QUESTION_NO = #{qno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUESTION WHERE QUESTION_SELLER = #{sellerNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT QUESTION_NO, TO_CHAR(Q.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE", QUESTION_WRITER, USER_ID, CATEGORY, QUESTION_TITLE, ORDER_NO, ANSWER, TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "ANSWER_DATE", NVL(SCORE, '999') "SCORE" FROM QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON (QUESTION_WRITER = USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ANSWER A USING (QUESTION_NO) WHERE QUESTION_SELLER = #{sellerNo} AND Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT QUESTION_NO, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE", QUESTION_WRITER, USER_ID, EMAIL, USER_NAME, SELLER_NAME, ANSWER, CATEGORY, ORDER_NO, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT, ANSWER_MODE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM QUESTION LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (QUESTION_WRITER = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN SELLER S ON (QUESTION_SELLER = S.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (QUESTION_NO = REF_QNO) WHERE QUESTION_NO = #{qno}

SELECT ANSWER_NO, QUESTION_NO, ANSWER_WRITER, ANSWER_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE", NVL(SCORE, '999') "SCORE", ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, ANSWER_MODE FROM ANSWER A LEFT JOIN QUESTION USING (QUESTION_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT ON (ANSWER_NO = REF_ANO) WHERE QUESTION_NO = #{qno}
